primaryId.description: The prefixed primary (MOD) ID for an entity. e.g. FB:FBgn0003301, MGI:87917.

secondaryIds.description: Collection of MOD-specific IDs that have been merged into basicGeneticEntity.

crossReferences.description: Collection holding a limited set of database cross references for each object.

constructComponents.description: the regulatory regions, expressed components, and targeted genes in this construct.

items.description: The set of components that make up the construct.
